meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, Council Briefing Room 6ES and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Approval of the minutes for the November 14, 2023 City of Dallas Housing Finance Corporation Meeting
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Action Item: Resolutions for the Estates at Ferguson
agenda_items.description: Consider and adopt partnership resolutions approving the form and substance of and authorizing the execution and delivery of documents and instruments necessary to carry out the financing and construction of Estates at Ferguson.

agenda_items.title: Action Item: Consider and Adopt the Corporation’s 2024 Annual Budget
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of the annual budget for the Corporation.

agenda_items.title: Review and discussion of Dallas HFC Treasurer’s report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of the financial report from the Treasurer.

agenda_items.title: Review and discussion of the Corporation’s pipeline report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of the current pipeline report.

financial_items.description: Governmental Note Financing for Estates at Ferguson
Loan financing from the City of Dallas
